_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Identifying with the senses and their ob: Let them not identify with the eye
Let them not identify sights
Let them not identify eye consciousness
Let them not identify eye contact
Let them not identify with the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
Let them not identify regarding that
Let them not identify as that
Let them not identify ‘that is mine’
Let them not identify the ear
Let them not identify the nose
Let them not identify the tongue
Let them not identify the body
Let them not identify the mind
Let them not identify thoughts
Let them not identify mind consciousness
Let them not identify mind contact
Let them not identify with the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
Let them not identify regarding that
Let them not identify as that
Let them not identify ‘that is mine’
Let them not identify with all
Let them not identify regarding all
Let them not identify as all
Let them not identify ‘all is mine’
